script: Create New Game. Learn Games Rules. => https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hangman_(game) Use 3d Library. => https://github.com/BabylonJS/Babylon.js/ Use Physics Library. => https://github.com/lo-th/Oimo.js/ Use JSON for Words. => words.json Build Game. Publish Game. => https://hangman.fatcode.pl/ Abracadabra.
